channel.title: 1. Number Theory on Thought Thou Art

item.title: 1.1 Greatest Common Divisor
item.description: Multiplication Let’s start with the basics first. We have learnt since childhood that multiplication is simply repeated addition. For eg, 3 x 4 is really the “shorthand notation” for saying 3 + 3 + 3 + 3. Where does multiplication show up practically, in real life? Suppose you have a room that is 3m wide and 4m long. How many 1m square tiles are needed to cover the room?
